Reviews.Title: “small, but good value”
Reviews.Author: erikchorvat
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2010 2011 4 nights realy nights acceptable own shower toilet reservation thru internet didnt checkin hotel subway station sant barcelona easy access beach 1015 minutes walking

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Thriveni B
Reviews.Content: started looking accommodation barcelona india sent request availability prompt reply comfortable experience till checked 6 days stay hotel friendly helpful staff stay enjoyable hotel clean easy access metro l2 hotel stay comfortable travel cost affordable worth money spacious balcony attached oh yes nice shops shopping strongly recommend hotel stay time barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel in lovely community”
Reviews.Author: Trowbridge86
Reviews.Content: nice hotel situated close train line untouristy nice community stalls outside mornings staff useful lock door broke fixed couple hours spacious clean amazing £50 night paid

Reviews.Title: “Best choice for a 3-night traveler for reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Kasimov
Reviews.Content: looking inexpensive hotel 3 nights barcelona managed book otelcom 45 eur night hotel bathroom clean tv wall local channels staff didnt speak english words spanish thats key pay invoice subway 5minute walk city center passage de gracia 15 minutes buy 10trip subway card eur valid busses trams minus hotel located near highway couldnt window nights traffic noise dust recommend people coming travel barcelona definetely youth hostels

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - I recommend it!”
Reviews.Content: daughter moved hotel booked citybreak clue title original hotel located outside city complaining tour operator offered hotel mighty glad located suburb outside city metro 5 mins walk easy hotel clean owners extremely friendly help night stay located centre suburb cafe culture outside door downside noise motorway 20 yards bother menu hotel cafe limited pizza continental breakfast available 7 euros partake lift carry heavy suitcases safe 4 euros night overall recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money + inexpensive parking”
Reviews.Author: aLucky
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights found hotel offered fairly cheap parking 5 euros night time connected city via purple metro line town sant de nice access sea walking distance hotel pretty basic pretty ok wifi internet free air conditioning didnt pretty chilly night

HotelInfo.Name: Ciutat de Sant Adria Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Santa Caterina 38 | Sant Adria del Besos, 08930 Barcelona, Spain
